basics.name: Daniel A. Maldonado Morales
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I was born in Torreón, Coahuila. I have a degree on computer systems engineering  which i earned at  "Instituto Tecnológico de la Laguna" Before starting to work as a software developer in Dedagroup México, I got a degree in Cs.M. on electrical engineering working in the development of a  system to monitoring a erogenerator after that I was working on my Ph.D. degree on elecrical engineering which was focused in mesh generation to electromagnetic problems using FEM (Finite Element Method).

work.summary: I am a software developer at Dedagroup. I work with on backend creating new queries, maintain the codebase and creating new features in Java for a prepaid card transactions software; I get my tasks assigned with an issue tracker (Redmine) and when I am done I talk with my project manager about the work developed so it can be reviewed.
I worked developing a mobile app for a record label that was able to register bands and their tour dates / events, it was also possible to see which events were closer to your location.

Worked on a system that could be able to get parameter from an aerogenerator (AG) and store them in a local and remote database. I developed the system in LabView and I used microcontrollers to monitoring the aerogenerator and I develop an app in Android to consume a restful API to get the information from the database and shows parameter to the user about the aerogenerator.

Monitoring system to aerogenerators (ISSN: 0188-9060). I Worked on a system that could be able to get parameter from an aerogenerator (AG) and store them in a local and remote database. I developed the system in LabView and I used microcontrollers to monitoring the aerogenerator and I develop an app in Android to consume a restful API to get the information from the database and shows parameter to the user about the aerogenerator.

education.studyType: Doctoral Degree: Mesh generator in 2D and 3D to electromagnetic problems with finite element.
Master’s Degree: Monitoring system to aerogenerators. (ISSN: 0188-9060)
Engineer: Monitoring variables from an electrical vehicule using an app develop in Android
